spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent layout adherence. Bedroom-1 proportions are slightly elongated compared to the original design. Door orientations for toilet-3 and toilet-4 are reversed. Window placements are generally accurate, though slightly simplified.

structural_fidelity.notes: All rooms are present with no hallucinations. Floating effect on a dark background is perfect. No text labels or measurement lines detected.

furniture_mapping.notes: Highly accurate furniture placement. The kitchen counter islands and bedroom rugs/furniture orientations match the 2D plan closely. Minor scale compression in the dining area chairs.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Strong adherence to low-poly, non-photorealistic aesthetic. Soft lighting and isometric camera are correct. Some subtle texture-like detailing on the kitchen counters prevents a perfect score for 'flat colors only'.

detected_errors.description: Bedroom-1 wall proportions slightly distorted/elongated compared to original plan.
Door swing orientations for Toilet-3 and Toilet-4 do not match the 2D layout.
